mapper.select: SELECT account_id accountId, account_level accountLevel FROM account WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND account_pw = PASSWORD(#{accountPw})

SELECT account_id accountId, account_state accountState, account_level accountLevel, account_createdate accountCreateDate, account_updatedate accountUpdateDate FROM account ORDER BY account_createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET account_state = "활성화" , account_updatedate = NOW() WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
UPDATE account SET account_state = "탈퇴" , account_updatedate = NOW() WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
